Full Memory: In return for distracting Argus Filch just when he is about to give Harry severe punishment, Harry promises he will come to Nearly Headless Nick's Deathday Party on Halloween. He brings Ron and Hermione along as well. While there, they meet Moaning Myrtle. There are trays holding piles of rotting food, and no other living guests are present. The three of them quickly get sickened by the ghostly party and return to the Great Hall.
Brief Summary: On Halloween Harry, Ron, and Hermione attend Nearly Headless Nick's death day party, but are soon grossed out and leave.
